display_long_description:
Unleash the Future of Mixed Reality Robot Battles!

Welcome to the future of virtual robot battles with Robo Dojo, an exciting Mixed Reality game designed exclusively for the Meta Quest platform. Immerse yourself in the thrill of the arena as you take control of a sumo-class robot, engaging in intense battles against AI opponents.

In Robo Dojo the objective is simple yet exhilarating - push AI robots out of the ring in a strategic battle for supremacy. What sets this game apart is the immersive nature of the experience. Your living room or chosen play area becomes the battleground, blurring the lines between the virtual and physical worlds.

As a prototype, Robo Dojo currently offers a one-player experience, allowing you to get a taste of the excitement. But this is just the beginning. We plan to introduce multiplayer modes, customizable robots, and more in future releases.

We invite you to be part of the Robo Dojo community on Discord. Share your experiences, provide feedback, and connect with other gamers. Your input during this beta phase will shape the evolution of the game, influencing the features and experiences we prioritize. We’re only a small team, but with your support, feedback, and enthusiasm we can do great things. Together, let's transform this prototype into a gaming phenomenon.

Designed for the Quest 3 but also compatible with Quest 2 passthrough. Download the Robo Dojo beta now and immerse yourself in Mixed Reality Robot Battles.
